cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure on October 27, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5706, Stop Sexual Assault and Harassment in Transportation Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 187 (Monday, October 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. DeFAZIO:
H.R. 5706.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1, Clause 3, and Clause 18 of
the Constitution.
[Page H5872]

latestAction.text: Star Print ordered on the bill.

title: Stop Sexual Assault and Harassment in Transportation Act
